Main-KOR-Questline-LetiumResearch.description: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials.  Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-Questline-CraftingBackpack.name: Crafting Better Bags
Main-KOR-Questline-CraftingBackpack.description: Few tools are more important to a prospector than a good backpack, and the prize for helping Korolev with a few extra tasks might even be described as 'Epic'. ,,  Main-KOR-Questline-BuildLaserDrill_Description,

Main-Osiris-Questline-Trust.name: Dangerous Science
Main-Osiris-Questline-Trust.description: Osiris came to Fortuna III to investigate the alien ruins, largely thought to be terraformers by an ancient civilization known as 'Progenitors'.  Helping them may unlock the secrets of the planet's deadly storms and its exotic radiation. Or at least, it'll unlock access to more advanced Osiris gear and medical items.

Main-Osiris-Questline-GruntWork.name: Field Research
Main-Osiris-Questline-GruntWork.description: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries. , ,  Main-Osiris-Questline-StrongStims_Description,

Main-Osiris-Questline-Howler.name: Howling Skies
Main-Osiris-Questline-Howler.description: A new predator stalks Fortuna III, preying on rookie and veteran prospectors alike. The emergence of this new creature may be a natural occurrence, or it may indicate impending changes... and on Fortuna III, change is seldom good.  Support Osiris in researching this new species: track down their nests, study their behavior, and acquire viable samples, by any means possible.

Main-KOR-FTUE-1.name: Welcome to the Workforce
Main-KOR-FTUE-1.shortDescription: Drop down to the Bright Sands Map and search for mineable Nickel veins around Rock Walls and Cliffs. You can also use a Scanner to help you find them.

Main-KOR-GainTrust-1.name: Sometimes violence IS the answer
Main-KOR-GainTrust-1.shortDescription: Striders are fast and aggressive. Don't let them swarm you.

Main-KOR-GainTrust-2.name: Spare Parts
Main-KOR-GainTrust-2.description: 'Some of our older machinery requires replacement parts to keep working. Maybe you can find us some on the surface
Main-KOR-GainTrust-2.shortDescription: Drop down to the Bright Sands Map and search around large Buildings and Structures for red Industrial Crates.

Main-KOR-GainTrust-3.name: Contaminated Waters
Main-KOR-GainTrust-3.description: 'We plan to send a team down to the old Bright Sands Water Facility to salvage some special parts
Main-KOR-GainTrust-3.shortDescription: Drop down to the Bright Sands Map and use your map to find the specified location.

Main-KOR-MiningTool-2.name: Inevitable Automation
Main-KOR-MiningTool-2.description: 'There's a new Mining Tool to make your life easier

Main-KOR-MiningTool-3.name: Tools of the Trade
Main-KOR-MiningTool-3.description: 'Show me that you know how to use a real

Main-KOR-MiningTool-4.name: Very Fast Moving Parts
Main-KOR-MiningTool-4.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop by the Blue Tarp under the Giant Skeleton in the Swamp on Bright Sands

Main-KOR-MiningTool-5.name: Final Touches
Main-KOR-MiningTool-5.description: 'Good news bad news situation. Our prototype works

Main-KOR-GruntWork-1.name: Spring Cleaning
Main-KOR-GruntWork-1.description: 'Some journalists have talked their way through all the red tape and will be getting a tour of the old Dig Site soon. Soften up the area for them

Main-KOR-GruntWork-2.name: Through the Optic Glass
Main-KOR-GruntWork-2.description: 'A new factory robot malfunctioned and took out another's eyes. It's best we don't advertise the accident

Main-KOR-GruntWork-3.description: 'I'm sure you're aware of these new beasts on the surface

Main-KOR-GruntWork-4.name: Aggressive Marketing
Main-KOR-GruntWork-4.description: 'Defoaming reports show a big decline in our weapons landing the final blow

Main-KOR-GruntWork-5.name: Zero Waste
Main-KOR-GruntWork-5.description: 'A shipping accident damaged a crate full of Scrappers already marked for sale. Get us these parts so we can repair them before it becomes an issue. '

Main-KOR-GruntWork-6.description: 'Urgently! About that fake 'evidence' you recovered for us
Main-KOR-GruntWork-6.shortDescription: Use your map to find the Jungle Camp deep inside the Bright Sands Jungle

Main-KOR-GruntWork-7.name: From Above
Main-KOR-GruntWork-7.description: 'Osiris are doing experiments with Meteor Fragments and Focus Crystals. Get us some samples

Main-KOR-GruntWork-8.name: Thick Skinned
Main-KOR-GruntWork-8.description: 'Marauders are made of something much tougher than Striders. Kill one and bring back some of its remains

Main-KOR-TitanOre-1.name: A Titanic Request
Main-KOR-TitanOre-1.description: 'One of our top engineers believes Prospectors are using radios on the surface to affect his dreams. It's absurd

Main-KOR-FocusCrystals-1.name: Clear Focus
Main-KOR-FocusCrystals-1.description: 'We have a new Scanner mod in the works

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-1.name: Site Seeing
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-1.description: 'A civy retrieval team operating in Crescent Falls brought back the remains of an old miner. That wouldn't normally concern us

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-2.name: Stormbringer
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-2.description: 'The Federal Authority is upgrading some of its arsenal

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-3.name: Rapid Gentrification
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-3.description: 'We need our science team to check these sites

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-4.name: Supply Drop
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-4.description: 'The ICA has started inspecting every ship coming back from the surface
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-4.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop at the Deep Underground Elevator at East Collection Point on Bright Sands

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-5.name: Messenger Service
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-5.description: Our team needs more time, but they've prepared a research package for us. It's too much data to send with their equipment, so you'll need to find an Uplink station; your credentials should get us the data they've stored in the surface network. ,, Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-5_ShortDescription,Find or purchase an ICA Data Drive and slot it into an Uplink Station to upgrade it to the specified Rarity.

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-6.name: Clearing the Way
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-6.description: 'ICA is cutting back and only inspecting returns from Crescent Falls

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-1.name: Forest Clearing
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-1.description: 'Creatures from the Jungle are still bleeding into nearby sites. Thin their numbers. '

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-2.description: 'A group of delegates from a trading partner will be visiting us soon

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-3.name: Show Them How It's Done
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-3.description: 'Our small arms team is working on iterations to new SMG type weapons and could do with more real world data. Give them a good show. '

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-4.name: A Pick Me Up
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-4.description: 'One of our agents operating in Bright Sands needs to replace their equipment. Stash these items at the Base Camp for them. '
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-4.shortDescription: Stash some Gear in the Gate C Dead Drop at the Base Camp on Bright Sands

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-1.name: Shopping List
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-1.description: 'Our researchers on the station have been analyzing the data you retrieved

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-2.name: Don't Dig Too Deep
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-2.description: 'It seems some creatures have higher concentrations of Letium than others... My people want some very specific samples now: head to the abandoned Dig Site mine in Bright Sands and hunt down what you can. '

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-3.name: Just a Call Away
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-3.description: 'We haven't heard from our ground team in days... The Cycle is stronger in the wilds

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-4.name: Collaborative Research
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-4.description: 'We've contacted an Osiris scientist willing to switch to help with our Letium research

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-5.name: It's All About Branding
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-5.description: 'Our team made it back home! It will be a while before they can get back to work... why not take some time and let everyone Korolev is still king of the hill?'

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-6.name: It's in the Blood
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-6.description: 'Our people have been able to extract stable Letium from biological samples

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-7.name: Fresh Meat
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-7.description: 'We've narrowed down the process that allows these creatures to absorb and stabilize Letium. Get us more samples

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-8.name: Trek for Data
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-8.description: 'Our research is nearly complete! Now we just need you to use the Uplink facilities on Crescent Falls; we should be able to use recent surface scans of the area to locate Letium vents. '

Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-1.name: Order Refill
Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-1.description: 'The synthetics team is close to a breakthrough on a lighter and more durable fabric

Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-2.name: Exotic Leathers
Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-2.description: 'Excellent... now we just need enough raw materials for a sample run. Getting these shouldn't be an issue for you

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-1.name: Building Blocks
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-1.description: 'Extracting Letium from the surface will require heavy machinery. Heavy

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-2.name: Pattern Testing
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-2.description: 'Something different this time... We need efficiency data on Shotgun style weapons to help improve our own. This shouldn't take you long

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-3.name: Custom Rig
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-3.description: 'Our hunt for parts continues. Ordering these off the market would take forever

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-4.name: Expensive Tastes
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-4.description: 'Our Osiris 'friend' is expecting another payment to continue their services. See that they get what they want. '

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-5.name: Delicate Parts
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-5.description: 'Our drilling platform is nearly complete! Now we just need parts for its laser drill... It won't be of much use without it!'

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-6.name: This is Goodbye
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-6.description: 'Our Osiris scientist plans to leave Fortuna

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-7.name: This isn't Science
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-7.description: 'We have to hold on our efforts

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-8.name: Unlimited Power
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-8.description: 'The Laser Drill needs something with more kick than even Veltecite. Get us some Meteor Cores

Main-KOR-KillCrusher-1.name: Tough as Nails
Main-KOR-KillCrusher-1.description: 'One of our researchers is concerned that Crushers are an unstoppable force that could easily wreck our mining platforms. I'm sure you can prove them wrong!'

Main-KOR-TestRun-1.name: The Test Run
Main-KOR-TestRun-1.description: 'Finally! Our first Laser Drill is fully operational

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-1.description: Prospector. We've caught some of our Miners, loaded with illegally mined Veltecite, on their way back from an area called Crescent Falls. Korolev used to have some mining operations there, which had to be abandoned. Drop down there and see if its safe for us again!,, Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-1_ShortDescription,Drop down to Crescent Falls, use your map to find the Hay fields and hunt some Creatures there to clear the area

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-2.description: Wow. Some minor radiation, but nothing your suit can't handle... I think. Go back down there and find Greens Prospect, used to be the heart of our operations on Crescent Falls.

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-3.description: Excellent! Haha, who would have thought that after all this time we might be able to resume operations on Crescent Falls! If you're up to the challenge, go see if the old Nutrion Farms Warehouse is still intact. And bring us back some Brittle Titan Ore, should be a bit more common on Crescent Falls.

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-4.description: The Nutrion Farms on Crescent Falls used to produce a majority of the Calories we needed to maintain our Workforce back in the day using some strange-tasting Nutritional Bars. I forgot their Name. But see if you can find any of those!

Main-ICA-FTUE-1.name: Simple Needs
Main-ICA-FTUE-1.description: 'Welcome! The ICA is always looking for new Prospectors to work with
Main-ICA-FTUE-1.shortDescription: Drop down to the Bright Sands Map and search around Buildings and Structures for any lootable containers.

Main-ICA-GainTrust-1.name: Don't Forget to Recycle
Main-ICA-GainTrust-1.description: 'Great! We're always in need of basic materials to help maintain this station and all its thousands of parts. Speaking of which... '

Main-ICA-GainTrust-3.name: Basic Needs
Main-ICA-GainTrust-3.description: 'Some of our air filters are starting to show wear; get me these parts so we can fix them up before they fail. '

Main-ICA-GainTrust-4.name: The Forester
Main-ICA-GainTrust-4.description: 'A lot of our crafts use Azure Tree Bark

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-1.description: 'As you know the ICA likes to tinker and create its own tools
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-1.shortDescription: Search for the Audio Decoy Schematics inside the Tall House next to the Rock Pools on Bright Sands.

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-2.description: 'Very good! We needed those for some live testing on the ground

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-3.description: 'The project's head engineer insists on building some of these new grenades on the planet itself
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-3.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop by the Blue Tarp under the Giant Skeleton in the Swamp on Bright Sands

Main-ICA-GruntWork-2.shortDescription: To get into Power Up Loot Rooms and your hands on Miniature Reactors, solve the Battery Puzzle and watch out for ambushes by rival prospectors!

Main-ICA-Gruntwork-3.1.name: Road Rage
Main-ICA-Gruntwork-3.1.description: 'These photographs are... disturbing. Even more so because this creature doesn't resemble any of the beasts we're used to. We need a better look... Korolev likes to place cameras to monitor their old installations
Main-ICA-Gruntwork-3.1.shortDescription: Search the Server Shelves in the Base Camp Office to see if the Cameras captured the Creature.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-5.description: 'I'm organizing a team to scout Bright Sands for Tao's comm signal; if he came close enough to an active repeater it should be logged in the network. And I need you to stash some spare equipment for them
Main-ICA-GruntWork-5.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop in front of the Big Satellite Dish at Comms Base on Bright Sands

Main-ICA-GruntWork-6.description: 'At least I finally know for sure. I have a lot to go through from the data you retrieved

Main-ICA-GruntWork-7.description: 'The old guard caught wind of the footage you retrieved for us earlier and almost went into almost panic. This creature

Main-ICA-GruntWork-8.description: 'Tao collected a lot of old research
Main-ICA-GruntWork-8.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop in the Office of Central Base Camp on Bright Sands. Miniature Reactors can be found in Power Facility Loot Rooms.

Main-ICA-GasGrenades-1.description: 'There was something that will interest you among all the data you recovered; get these items to the Comms Tower stash and we can begin working on a new kind of grenade. '
Main-ICA-GasGrenades-1.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop at the foot of Comms Tower in Comms Base on Bright Sands

Main-ICA-GasGrenades-2.description: 'We'll need something 'special' for these; head down and retrieve these items for us

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-1.description: 'Our people have gone through more of the data Tao recovered

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-2.description: 'This sort of research requires equipment we don't have at hand

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-2.1.description: 'We wanted to send down a team to recover materials directly

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-3.description: 'I read through the report you brought back; it's not the easy win I had hoped for

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-4.description: 'I'm preparing to send a team down to the surface to finalize a prototype and run tests well away from the station; everyone assures me it's safe

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-5.description: 'One of the supply crates for our project was left open under the rain
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-5.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop around Greens Prospect on Crescent Falls

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-1.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop at Greens Prospect on Crescent Falls

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-2.description: 'Another prospector took a bad beating in Crescent Falls; foam kit failed to deploy fully and left his arm exposed. Not much left of it when the retrieval bot got to him

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-3.description: 'Fruit from Fortuna III fetches a nice price in the Artery systems

Main-ICA-OilSearch-2.description: 'This whole ordeal has sapped too many of our funds and resources

Main-ICA-OilSearch-3.description: 'Another location mentioned is around the Skeleton Research area; head there and clear it out. Hrmm

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-1.description: 'I've been sitting on a fairly 'particular' commission from an out of system arms company for some time

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-2.description: 'We have reports of increased creature activity in several locations; go to each and thin out their numbers. '

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-3.description: 'A private researcher has requested we help them acquire certain creature parts; apparently they usually got them from Osiris for free

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-2.description: 'I've been stumped trying to find a birthday gift for one of ICA's oldest members
Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-2.shortDescription: Hunt Rattlers at different ICA structures on Bright Sands

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-3.description: 'I appreciate you doing that for me... but I have one more thing to ask. If you could get me some rattler skins and bone plates

Main-ICA-OilPump-1.description: 'Our people on the surface analyzed everything at the locations you cleared
Main-ICA-OilPump-1.shortDescription: Stash the specified items in the Office Dead Drop at Nutrion Farms on Crescent Falls

Main-ICA-OilPump-2.description: 'While our people look into the 'crude' samples

Main-ICA-OilPump-3.description: 'We finally know that 'NiC' stands for Nanite-infused Crude. Someone figured out a way to trigger a reaction in the nanobots' own batteries and get a small burst of energy from them; not much

Main-ICA-OilPump-4.description: 'While we work on building those pumps

Main-ICA-OilPump-6.description: 'Getting these pumps to work isn't as simple as we'd hoped. The pumps need to refine the NiC to eliminate as much crude as possible and concentrate the nanites in one convenient package ready for use

Main-ICA-OilPump-7.description: 'That Dr. Sullivan is starting to poke around and ask questions

Main-ICA-OilPump-8.description: 'You're back just in time; the tech guys have a new list of things they need to finalize NiC refiner and install them in the pumps. After that it will just be a matter of calling them down in the right spot... '

Main-ICA-TestRun-1.description: 'We've gotten reports of Crushers near several of the candidate locations for our oil pump test runs. If one of those beasts wanders into the area while the pumps are running

Main-ICA-TestRun-2.description: 'Time to see if our plans will pay out. Use your new Scanner mod to find wells

Main-Osiris-FTUE-1.name: Prove your Worth
Main-Osiris-FTUE-1.description: 'Another Prospector? I guess we could use the muscle. Show me you know how to handle yourself on the surface

Main-Osiris-GainTrust-1.description: 'These Abandoned Containers might still have useful supplies in them
Main-Osiris-GainTrust-1.shortDescription: Consumable Boxes can be found in and around most major human Structures. You can recognise them by the black grenade icon painted onto the lid.

Main-Osiris-GainTrust-2.name: Fertile Grounds
Main-Osiris-GainTrust-2.description: 'My team has seen an increase in Strider population in the Bright Sands Swamp; take down some of those creatures and return with the right samples. '

Main-Osiris-GainTrust-4.name: Papers, Please,, Main-Osiris-GainTrust-4_Description,'We need to run some tests on how the creatures of Fortuna III identify each other, how they tell friend from foe. These samples should advance our research. '

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-1.description: 'You've proven to be more capable than the average prospector

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-2.description: 'The Lake in Bright Sands is home to a few very valuable endemic creatures

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-3.shortDescription: Find the Powered Door in the Underground of East Collection Point on Bright Sands and slot in 3 Batteries to enter the Loot Room.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-3.1.description: 'The process that mutates a Strider into a Heavy Strider still isn't fully understood. We need more samples for our research; kill some of the creatures

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-4.description: 'One of our more 'hands-on' researchers forgot how to pack their tool bag
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-4.shortDescription: Biological Samplers can be found in Medical Cases. Search for the Dead Drop by the Blue Tarp under the Giant Skeleton in the Swamp on Bright Sands.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-5.description: 'We sent another prospector for a simple milk run to the Vaccine Labs

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-6.description: 'The financial team is struggling to figure out what project to waste money on for next quarter. How do you fit in? Well

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-8.description: 'I plan on sending down a team to collect more old samples. Make sure they're well supplied
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-8.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop at Greens Prospect on Crescent Falls

Main-Osiris-StrongStims-0.1.description: 'This should interest you: we have a small team researching new

Main-Osiris-StrongStims-1.description: 'The formula is very exact... we need certain chemicals from older Medical Supplies

Main-Osiris-StrongStims-2.description: 'There are a few more items from the surface our team needs

Main-Osiris-CaveRumors-1.description: Drop down to Crescent Falls and find our old Processing Plant at Nutrion Farms, Prospector. We need to verify whether any of that old machinery is still in useable condition. And, while you're there, bring back some Fauna and Flora samples.

Main-Osiris-CaveRumors-2.description: 'We've received several reports of rival actors searching the Favela on Crescent Falls for something; we don't know what

Main-Osiris-CaveRumors-3.description: 'I listened through parts of that crashed ship's flight recorder

Main-Osiris-StormSamples-1.description: 'You've experienced one of the planet's famed Storms already

Main-Osiris-StormSamples-3.description: 'We're interested in running more tests on Storm-affected samples
Main-Osiris-StormSamples-3.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop in the Office at Nutrion Farms on Crescent Falls

Main-Osiris-ExplosivesTry-1.description: 'The notebook you brought back was most interesting

Main-Osiris-SideWork1-1.description: 'Dr. Fedotov is... a character. He's requested an office with a garden and refuses to speak with anyone on his team until he gets it. Get me these items so we can just get this over with. '

Main-Osiris-SideWork1-4.description: 'The good Dr. Fedotov is trying my patience with his absurd requests. You're to take down some of your rival Prospectors... and bring back some Dustblooms. I swear

Main-Osiris-PrototypeLaser-1.description: 'It appears Dr. Fedotov had already conferred with Dr. Farinha about how to break into the Crystal Caverns; it figures the man wouldn't write anything down and make our lives easy. He insists only a high powered laser drill can get through those walls

Main-Osiris-PrototypeLaser-2.description: 'Progress is slower than I'd hoped. Korolev refuses to share schematics for their decommissioned Veltecite Laser Drill platforms

Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-1.description: 'We're continuing to research better ways to keep prospectors like you alive on the planet

Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-2.description: 'The chemical properties of Fortuna III's flora and fauna is truly fascinating... one would expect it to be completely foreign to our own

Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-3.description: 'We have reason to believe Korolev has a mole and is trying to steal our work on these Medkits and put them to market before we do; I've seeded rumors to different members of my team
Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-3.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop at the Waterfall Lab by the Lake on Bright Sands

Main-Osiris-CrystalSamples-1.description: 'It's time to start testing our new anti-crystal laser

Main-Osiris-CrystalSamples-3.description: 'Our laser cannon has proven to be... 'hazardous' to test on the station. We've developed a small portable version for further tests. Clear out the Pinnacle labs of hostile fauna and stash some Pure Focus Crystals there; a field research team will be down for further tests once you're done. '

Main-Osiris-CraftFuel-1.description: 'Our recent tests have made it quite apparent our anti-crystal laser cannot be safely operated in atmosphere

Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-1.description: 'It's almost time to get our satellite into orbit. Hack into the surface Uplink network

Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-2.description: 'It's been brought to my attention that orbital weapons are banned in this system

Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-3.description: 'It appears that tricking the network to accept our satellite as legitimate is a more involved process than I had been lead to believe. A team of specialists will be heading to the surface soon to get the job done
Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-3.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop in the Server Room at Starport Admin on Crescent Falls

Main-Osiris-CombatStims-1.description: 'Research into Fortuna III's biosphere has so much potential

Main-Osiris-CombatStims-3.description: 'Initial trials have proven to be... disappointing. The near-immediate healing process works flawlessly

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-1.description: 'Target calibration on our satellite is off; it was within acceptable parameters in our original designs
Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-1.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop at Pinnacle Labs on Crescent Falls

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-2.description: 'The ICA has been following up on all our recent 'weapons' research on station and gotten curious about the lack of tangible results. Head to the surface and perform some 'tests' with Osiris gear on some unwilling participants

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-3.description: 'The worst outcome is of course the most likely. The satellite will need to be modified while in orbit and part of the outer casing replaced. Retrieve these materials

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-4.description: 'The satellite's orbit is too low for our technicians to safely operate at due to all the TEF radiation from the planet. We'll need to construct specialized EVA suits; a mesh made from crusher hide to envelop them might be enough to keep our people safe. For a short while

Main-Osiris-TestRun-1.description: 'It's time! Head to the Crystal Caverns' entrance and place the Orbital Cannon Beacon; once its finally served its purpose

Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-1.description: Ah, Prospector! Grab some decent Gear and drop down to Crescent Falls, an Area that used to be of great Interest to our Research and that now might be accessible again, if the bragging from Korolev numbskulls is to be trusted. Go check!
Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-1.shortDescription: Drop down to Crescent Falls and use your Map to find the specified Locations

Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-2.description: Hmm... yes. Radiation Levels would be too high for me to spend my Weekend down there, but we have you for that. We used to research the Flora on Crescent Falls quite extensively, see if you can find some of the Pale Ivy Blossoms we used in Material Science and Medicine Synthesis back then!

Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-3.description: Hah. Can't wait to see Vadim's face once we start manufacturing the best Stims on Prospect Station again! Thank you. Now, last but not least, see if you can clear the Area around the big Skeleton of hostile Fauna so we can resurrect our old Observation Site there!

Main-KOR-Caverns-1.description: 'Your raids of old Osiris data unearthed something I had forgotten about

Main-KOR-Caverns-3.description: 'There is a lot to go through here: accounts of illnesses
Main-KOR-Caverns-3.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop around Korolev Island HQ on Tharis Island

Main-KOR-Caverns-4.description: 'Evidently the word has spread quickly that Tharis Island is again safe to step on

Main-KOR-Caverns-5.description: 'Another lead has come up from the logbook you recovered; one of the team's geologists was collecting a 'strange ore'. I can't tell what that means

Main-KOR-Caverns-6.shortDescription: Search for the three Mining Machines in and around the Korolev Island HQ and the nearby Mine on Tharis Island

Main-KOR-Caverns-7.description: 'Our researchers want more of these exotic samples

Main-KOR-Caverns-10.description: 'Nothing is working out! Nothing you brought back is natural

Main-KOR-Caverns-11.description: 'I had thought the reports of sickness were fake

Main-KOR-Caverns-12.description: 'We've mapped out the areas my men can access safely

Main-KOR-Caverns-13.description: 'The records you brought back... they paint a bad picture. One of Gregor's trusted men went missing down there carrying the only true records of the operation

Main-ICA-Caverns-1.description: 'There is a special task I would like you to carry out for us
Main-ICA-Caverns-1.shortDescription: Drop down to Tharis Island and investigate what happened to the Colonists

Main-ICA-Caverns-2.description: 'Killed... with guns and blades. By other people. I don't know how to convey this to the families

Main-ICA-Caverns-3.description: 'The diary you brought back to us only leaves me with more questions. Whoever attacked the site went after Osiris' first
Main-ICA-Caverns-3.shortDescription: Find the Holo Map at the Osiris Research Center on Tharis Island and stash it in the Pinnacle Labs Dead Drop on Crescent Falls

Main-ICA-Caverns-3.1.description: 'There are rumors spreading around about this island

Main-ICA-Caverns-4.description: 'I've done some digging around old files

Main-ICA-Caverns-6.description: 'We only managed to recover a few fragments of the videolog you recovered

Main-ICA-Caverns-7.description: 'I've been reviewing more of the recordings you brought back to us
Main-ICA-Caverns-7.shortDescription: Search for the mysterious Door near the Osiris Research Center on Tharis Island

Main-ICA-Caverns-8.description: 'That door? It's not made of any alloy we've seen used before. There are mentions of some sort of new metal Osiris was studying
Main-ICA-Caverns-8.shortDescription: Mine Tharis Iron around the Island and stash it in the Dead Drop hidden at Korolev Core Outpost

Main-ICA-Caverns-9.description: 'Whatever this stuff you got us is
Main-ICA-Caverns-9.shortDescription: Search for the Advanced Analysis Toolkit at Pinnacle Labs on Crescent Falls

Main-ICA-Caverns-10.description: 'We've determined only that we don't know what this stuff is. High concentration of iron

Main-ICA-Caverns-11.description: 'I think it's time we send a clearer message; the corps might not care if the cannon fodder they send down come back encased in foam each time

Main-ICA-Caverns-12.description: 'The Council expressed 'strong concerns' over my proposed plan
Main-ICA-Caverns-12.shortDescription: Search the Pit on Tharis Island for the missing Osiris Chief Engineer and see what you can bring back

Main-ICA-Caverns-13.description: 'We're looking into all this... both Korolev and Osiris found these rare materials in the caverns
Main-ICA-Caverns-13.shortDescription: Work for Osiris to figure out how to get your hands on Charged Tharis Iron Ingots. Or just take them off another Prospector

Main-ICA-Caverns-13.1.description: 'If you find some more NiC Oil Cannisters or Old Currency
Main-ICA-Caverns-13.1.shortDescription: Work for the ICA to unlock the ability to extract NIC Oil

Main-Osiris-Caverns-1.description: 'You're ready. I have some recon work for you

Main-Osiris-Caverns-1.1.shortDescription: Search for Spine Briars around Red Grass and the strange Architecture on Tharis Island

Main-Osiris-Caverns-2.description: 'I need more information before I act; get into the Korolev Island HQ and retrieve whatever information that might shed some light on what happened. If Korolev truly is responsible for what happened

Main-Osiris-Caverns-3.description: 'Unexpected. Both our people and Korolev's were attacked by a third party
Main-Osiris-Caverns-3.shortDescription: Search for the Osiris Surveyor Pods in the Cave of Stars on Tharis Island

Main-Osiris-Caverns-4.shortDescription: Search for the Dead Drop at the Osiris Labs on Tharis Island

Main-Osiris-Caverns-4.1.description: 'One of my researchers working in the Crescent Falls area has some theories on those Spine Briar plants
Main-Osiris-Caverns-4.1.shortDescription: Search for Spine Briars around Red Grass and the strange Architecture on Tharis Island

Main-Osiris-Caverns-5.description: 'The results came back on the Crushers irradiated by Tharis: inconclusive; none of the creatures you dispatched seemed to be over a decade old
Main-Osiris-Caverns-5.shortDescription: Search the Cave of Stars on Tharis Island for more of this mysterious luminescent compound

Main-Osiris-Caverns-7.description: 'These 'Teratomorphic Crystals' are proving to be an interesting puzzle. There's nothing organic or 'living' about them
Main-Osiris-Caverns-7.shortDescription: Search for the mysterious Markings on Walls around Tharis Island

Main-Osiris-Caverns-8.description: 'It appears the cultists were fixated on the same rare ore that kept Korolev and our own Osiris people

Main-Osiris-Caverns-9.description: 'Our experiments with Tharis Iron proved very productive; concentrated blasts of TEF radiation caused the samples to react by warping into different shapes. Some

Main-Osiris-Caverns-10.description: 'It's clear that the importance of these caverns can't be overstated; Korolev stumbled upon a Progenitor terraforming artifact and they simply decided to mine around it

Main-Osiris-Caverns-11.description: 'Korolev had people block off the deepest caverns
Main-Osiris-Caverns-11.shortDescription: Venture deeper into the Caves to find out what the Cultists were protecting

Main-Osiris-Caverns-12.description: 'Fascinating... The installation on Tharis Island may not have been part of the Progenitor terraformer network
Main-Osiris-Caverns-12.shortDescription: Find out what happens when you feed Tharis Iron into the Alien Device during an active Storm

Main-Osiris-Caverns-13.1.shortDescription: Find a way into the Mysterious Cave south of Fallen Tree on Crescent Falls

Main-Osiris-Caverns-14.description: 'I think it's time to move forward with our work on the Abyss Forge. Use the 'recipe' you found earlier

Main-Osiris-Howler-2.description: 'Definitely not the outcome I expected from your investigations. It appears you may have discovered a new form of creature

Main-Osiris-Howler-3.description: 'One of my assistants raised a concerning possibility about our mysterious new friend. During the early stages of prospecting a creature known as 'Howler' surfaced and effectively halted all operations on the planet. Despite their dominance

Main-Osiris-Howler-7.shortDescription: Ichor Bulbs can be found in Howler Eggs. Tread Carefully.

Main-Osiris-Howler-8.description: 'There've been sightings of a new Howler only seen during storms

Main-KOR-Unique-1.name: Miners' Strike
Main-KOR-Unique-1.shortDescription: Search for the 3 Piles of Korolev Body Bags at the Dig Site on Bright Sands and deliver the Miner Cam from each

Main-KOR-Unique-2.name: The Missing Engineer
Main-KOR-Unique-2.description: 'Prospector! We believe we've located where our Letium-covered friend was working
Main-KOR-Unique-2.shortDescription: Search for the Missing Engineer around the caves south of Starport Warehouse on Crescent Falls and deliver Evidence of Letium

Main-KOR-Unique-3.name: Lab Heist
Main-KOR-Unique-3.description: 'Our new scientist friend believes Osiris was already researching the presence of Letium in various creatures. Head to their main lab on Bright Sands and bring back whatever samples they were studying. '
Main-KOR-Unique-3.shortDescription: Search the Waterfall Lab on Bright Sands for Letium Bio Samples and deliver them

Main-KOR-Unique-4.name: Salvage Ops
Main-KOR-Unique-4.description: 'There's no point in reinventing the wheel! Head out to the crashed Laser Drill on Bright Sands
Main-KOR-Unique-4.shortDescription: Search for the Old Drill Head at the Crashed Drill West of East Collection Point on Bright Sands and deliver the Laser Drill Control Unit

Main-ICA-Unique-1.name: SOS Sign
Main-ICA-Unique-1.shortDescription: Search for the SOS Sign at the Beach South of the Water Facility on Bright Sands

Main-ICA-Unique-2.name: Old Friend
Main-ICA-Unique-2.description: 'I'm not surprised you didn't find anyone... I think I know who left the SOS there
Main-ICA-Unique-2.shortDescription: Slot in 3 Batteries at the Water Facility on Bright Sands to enter the Loot Room and search it for a sign of Life from the Stranded Prospector.

Main-ICA-Unique-3.name: The Stranded Prospector
Main-ICA-Unique-3.description: 'We found a number of candidate locations Tao could have visited

Main-ICA-Unique-4.name: Plan B Part 1
Main-ICA-Unique-4.description: 'There were quite a few people involved with this research
Main-ICA-Unique-4.shortDescription: Search the Bright Sands Power Plant for the Office

Main-ICA-Unique-5.name: Plan B Part 2
Main-ICA-Unique-5.shortDescription: Search the Crescent Falls Geothermal Plant for the Office behind a Forcefield

Main-ICA-Unique-6.name: Abandoned Oil Field
Main-ICA-Unique-6.description: 'This stuff is actual crude oil... mixed with billions upon billions of dead nanobots. It must have been used by the Progenitors to help terraform the planet! My predecessors from before the storms set up some pumps to collect the stuff; head to them and retrieve what you can. '

Main-Osiris-Unique-1.name: Old Bones
Main-Osiris-Unique-1.description: 'I've been looking through old notes from before the evacuations and came upon something... interesting. There were some unique bone samples found at the Archaeology site
Main-Osiris-Unique-1.shortDescription: Search the East Caverns on Bright Sands for the Archaeology Site

Main-Osiris-Unique-2.name: Extinct Creatures
Main-Osiris-Unique-2.description: 'Remember those Old Bones you brought back earlier? There's a mystery there
Main-Osiris-Unique-2.shortDescription: Enter the Extinct Creatures Lab at the North End of the Giant Skeleton on Crescent Falls and find the Warden Tooth.

Main-Osiris-Unique-3.name: Crashed Osiris Freighter
Main-Osiris-Unique-3.description: 'I've been looking into everyone that worked at the Extinct Creatures lab
Main-Osiris-Unique-3.shortDescription: Find the Crashed Osiris Freighter in the Jungle on Bright Sands

Main-Osiris-Unique-4.name: Lost Scientist
Main-Osiris-Unique-4.description: 'It'll take some time to run tests on these. In the meantime
Main-Osiris-Unique-4.shortDescription: Search the Favela Clinic on Crescent Falls for the Lost Scientist

Main-Osiris-Unique-5.name: Frozen
Main-Osiris-Unique-5.shortDescription: Search inside Pinnacle Labs on Crescent Falls for the Frozen Scientist
Main-Osiris-Unique-5.description: 'That crystal structure enveloping the caverns is far more resistant than I thought imaginable

Main-KOR-Caverns-0.1-Unlock.description: Prospector. We need help in exploring an area of Fortuna that you've never been to before, but before we discuss anything more with you, we need to know you're ready. Show us that you are.
Main-KOR-Caverns-0.1-Unlock.shortDescription: Prove to Korolev that you are ready to explore Tharis Island by increasing your Reputation Level.

Main-KOR-Caverns-0.2-Unlock.description: Well done. You've become a real asset to Korolev. Hand in some of the Scrip you earned so we can send you to the new Area we have discovered.
Main-KOR-Caverns-0.2-Unlock.shortDescription: Earn Faction Scrip by completing Missions and Jobs for Korolev and hand it in to earn Drop Pod Navigational Data for Tharis Island.

Main-ICA-Caverns-0.1-Unlock.description: You're not ready yet to help us with this next task. Come back once you've shown us what you're made of.
Main-ICA-Caverns-0.1-Unlock.shortDescription: Prove to the ICA that you are ready to explore Tharis Island by increasing your Reputation Level.

Main-ICA-Caverns-0.2-Unlock.description: Hmm. I think you've got what it takes for Tharis. Get us some valuables we can use to bribe your way past Korolev Security, we will take care of the rest.

Main-Osiris-Caverns-0.1-Unlock.description: We have received some intel on one of our old research sites potentially being ready to be reclaimed. The area was completely inaccessible due to radiation and terrifying creatures, but now the radiation seems to have faded.. at least a little. For the creatures, however, you are not ready yet. Keep being a valuable asset to us and we may grant you access to this area.
Main-Osiris-Caverns-0.1-Unlock.shortDescription: Prove to Osiris that you are ready to explore Tharis Island by increasing your Reputation Level.

Main-Osiris-Caverns-0.2-Unlock.description: Ah, our most efficient Prospector. Good. I think you should be able to handle exploring Tharis now. Bring us the parts we need to improve your drop pod so you don't go up in flames as you drop to the Island.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Howler-1.name: Winged Pests
NEW-Hard-KOR-Howler-1.description: Prospector, we need your help. These damned Howlers that just... randomly appeared during our mining operations are becoming a real problem for our personnel. Go clear the skies a little.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Howler-1.name: Biomimicry
NEW-Hard-ICA-Howler-1.description: Ah, there you are. We need to get our hands on one of those Howler Darts for potential military applications, and who better to take care of that than our finest Prospector? It needs to be stashed for our Research Team.

NEW-Hard-Osiris-Howler-1.name: Between dark clouds
NEW-Hard-Osiris-Howler-1.description: Hm. The Creature commonly referred to as the Howler seems to react to the Storm in some strange way, but we dont understand the connection yet. Go hunt one during a Storm.

Main-KOR-Questline-Stormdivers.name: STORM DIVERS: Forged in the Storm
Main-KOR-Questline-Stormdivers.description: Freak storms have appeared over Fortuna III

Main-ICA-Questline-Stormdivers.name: STORM DIVERS: Storm Breaker
Main-ICA-Questline-Stormdivers.description: Crescent Falls and Tharis Island are affected by a new kind of storm

Main-Osiris-Questline-Stormdivers.name: STORM DIVERS: Lightning in a bottle
Main-Osiris-Questline-Stormdivers.description: A new and unexplained meteorological event is covering much of the surface; while Bright Sands is unaffected

Main-KOR-Stormdivers-4.description: 'Those fragments you brought back are very interesting indeed! Korolev needs more people down there

Main-KOR-Stormdivers-5.description: 'Just who I needed! There have been reports that our latest batch of weapons have been of faulty

Main-KOR-Stormdivers-6.description: 'Another prospector brought back a full Altered Meteor Core to the ICA

Main-KOR-Stormdivers-7.description: 'Too many beasts down there! Almost every other prospector I send down comes back encased in foam now! Get a KOMRAD and thin the heard

Main-ICA-Stormdivers-2.description: 'One of our salvage crews noticed a strange organic construction

Main-ICA-Stormdivers-3.description: 'This is something of a delicate matter

Main-ICA-Stormdivers-4.description: 'Osiris has made a big show about how well their gear handles during these stormy conditions. Show them up

Main-ICA-Stormdivers-5.description: 'One of our scientists has been playing around with fragments from the meteors that fall over Crescent Falls and Tharis Island

Main-ICA-Stormdivers-6.description: 'Savage Marauders have been making short work of even seasoned prospectors ever since these storms started

Main-ICA-Stormdivers-7.description: 'Our people have had an eureka moment with the Altered Meteor Fragments you delivered! If we can get our hands on enough full cores

Main-Osiris-Stormdivers-2.description: 'Some concerns came to my attention regarding the reliability of our armament under these new storm conditions. Reassure the station that our gear's only weakness is its operator: use Osiris weapons and cut down some creatures. And some of your upstart rivals too

Main-Osiris-Stormdivers-3.description: 'I'm sent a man to Crescent Falls to perform research on-site

Main-Osiris-Stormdivers-4.description: 'We've received reports of a new organic structure located in Crescent Falls
Main-Osiris-Stormdivers-4.shortDescription: The Creature has reportedly been nesting in a Tree south of Jungle Thermal Ponds as well as on top of Nutrion Farms Processing.

Main-Osiris-Stormdivers-5.description: 'Our weapons team has been running some simulations for new flechette ammunition and need real world data

Main-Osiris-Stormdivers-6.description: 'I take it you've seen how the meteors falling through storms are altered by it

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-1-FTUE.description: 'You want more work? I might have some tasks you can help with

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-2.description: 'Good job keeping the factions happy... they may have their own agendas

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-4.description: 'Osiris aren't the only crew interested in all this crazy planet and storm stuff. Plenty of buyers in the Artery

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-5.description: 'Been talking with some of the faction guys

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-6.description: 'I've got my eyes on some of that new stuff that's been showing up on the station lately. The factions are being really tight fisted about it

Codex_Fortuna_Cycle.description: The Teratomorphic Energy Field, more commonly known as <BH2>'The Cycle'</>, is a hazardous radiation effect that encompasses the entire planet of Fortuna III, though there exist 'windows' that allow for humans, and their technology, to operate without suffering the worst effects.  Initially only causing delicate equipment to malfunction, each wave, found to be following a predictable cadence, increased in intensity until basic machinery failed entirely and colonists left unconscious for the duration. Less than a month after <BH2>the colonies were evacuated</> the energy field settled over the entire world, with its ebb and flow causing <BH2>terrible storms</> over the areas not fully covered by The Cycle.

Codex_Fortuna_Map2.description: Located next to <BH2>Bright Sands</>, the large fallen Progenitor ruin at its center gave the area its name. Originally meant to support the construction and eventual operation of the nearby Archimedes science campus, the warm natural pools and rich fertile soil attracted enough interest and business to form the beginnings of a small community of its own.  Even experienced prospectors should be cautious here, as some of the fiercest creatures have make their nests in the abandoned shipping ports and overgrown facilities.

Codex_Station.description: Orbiting Fortuna III, Habitat's station was never meant to house even a tenth of its current population, numbering in the hundreds of thousands. Built to be a holding area for the rich and powerful, and the system-wide HQ for several megacorps, the station became home to most of the colonists fleeing the surface, with entire freighters and other ships grafted on to it to make space for the new population.  Renamed to <BH2>'Prospect Station'</> once prospectors started dropping to the planet to bring back valuable resources, the station now serves as the hub for a system now cut off from the rest of humanity by a measure of years.

Codex_Station_LaunchingTutorial.description: The Launch Terminal overlooking Fortuna III will get you in your pod and off to whichever death trap you chose to drop to. Just don't forget to tidy your bag and check your gear before you head out!  You'll also be able to go through the <BH2>Tutorial Simulation</> again if you need a refresher, or just want to enjoy Fortuna III from the safety of orbit.

Codex_Factions_ICA.description: Initially meant to be only a temporary planetary civilian body to direct the colonization efforts, the <BH2>ICA</> on <BH2>Prospect Station</> came to be the de facto government for the Fortuna system after the Cycle forced the planet's evacuation. Currently its goal is just to keep the station alive and its community healthy, acting as an interface between Habitat, the official station owners, and the various <BH2>factions</> of the station, including the Prospectors that help retrieve vital resources.  The Advisory committee is made up of former colonists, station oligarchs, business representatives, and union leaders, each with their own conflicting interests, often leading to the organization having no clear goals other than the general wellbeing of the station's populace and maintaining a somewhat peaceful status quo.

Codex_Factions_Osiris.description: Formed from the remnants of several research shops and filled with academics, <BH2>Osiris</> was left rudderless after the Cycle cut off effective communications with their parent company. While their goal of researching Progenitor artefacts and reverse engineering their technology remains the same, without access to the surface itself their work was limited to just idle theorizing.  Thankfully the corporation's newest head recognized the value prospectors could offer and is more than happy to send them off to danger for a pittance, so long as they remain effective.

Codex_Prospecting.description: 'Prospector' is the title given to those that brave going down to the planet's surface. Initially a legal requirement for anyone putting their life at risk to mine for valuable minerals

Codex_Prospecting_Insurance.description: The surface is a dangerous place to be

Codex_Prospecting_Bags.description: While your <BH2>Safety Pockets</> may be able to carry a bit of loot around, a prospector is nothing without their trusty Bag.  The better the bag, the more weight it can carry. Be careful to not just fill it up without thinking, though, it'll get heavy, and you never know when you might need to rummage around there in an emergency.

Codex_Prospecting_Consumables.description: <BH2>Stims</> and <BH2>Medkits</> will keep you alive on the planet; use Stims for a quick health boost, and reserve the Medkits for when you've got enough time to use them.  <BH2>Grenades</> don't just come in the big boom variety; an <BH2>Audio Decoy</> or <BH2>Smoke Grenade</> might hide your escape or aid in an ambush, while a <BH2>Gas Grenade</> will turn any area into a serious safety hazard.

Codex_Prospecting_Armor.description: If you want to keep your insides inside, then you'll want to equip a <BH2>Shield</> vest and a <BH2>Helmet</>. The higher the <BH2>Armor</> value, the more damage it will absorb from each hit, while a higher <BH2>Durability</> keeps it, and you, intact for longer.  Don't forget to <BH2>Repair</> your damaged equipment at the <BH2>Gear Printer</>!

Codex_FortunaPass.description: The Cycle: Frontier</> features serveral months' long seasons during which a Fortuna Pass is active. Each season a new <BH2>Fortuna Pass</> will become available

Codex_VanityShop.description: Cosmetic items help you stand apart from the competition and define how you want to look on Fortuna III, but don't have any gameplay effects.  There are various types, and <BH2>any Cosmetics you unlock or purchase are tied to your account and won't be lost on the surface.</>

Codex_VanityShop_Other.description: You can further personalize your <BH2>Prospector</> with <BH2>Sprays</> and <BH2>Banners</> to decorate Fortuna III, and <BH2>Emotes</> to show off to others what you're really thinking. ,   Codex_S02EventMain_Title,Storm Divers Event

Codex_S02EventMain.description: Strange things are afoot on Fortuna III.

Codex_S02EventDuration.description: Storm Divers Event <BH2>concludes</> Season 2.  The event will last until the end of the season and the <BH2>LAST WIPE</> of The Cycle: Frontier, with the subsequent start of Season 3.

Codex_S02EventStormMeteors.description: <BH2>Storms</> on Crescent Falls and Tharis Island have <BH2>tripled in frequency</>.

Codex_S02EventPodsEvacs.description: When dropping to event maps you may sometimes make it to the surface during the Dusk

Codex_S02EventCoresFragments.description: <BH2>Meteor Showers</> on Crescent falls bring down strange <BH2>Altered Meteor Cores</> and <BH2>Altered Meteor Fragments</>

Codex_S02EventFreeGear.description: Weapons of Epic, Exotic, and Legendary quality can now be produced at the Gear Printer using Altered Meteor Cores and Fragments.  Other Epic and Exotic gear is now printable in the same way, too, including powerful <BH2>Attachments</> and the <BH2>Oil Pump, Laser Drill, and Orbital Cannon</> beacons.

Codex_S02EventSkins.description: Each faction will ask you for assistance in investigation of what's going on. Completeing the event missions will culminate in awarding you with a unique vanity item, one per faction. You can only get these during the Storm Divers event!,  Codex_S02EventFlyers_Title,Storm Divers Commissions

Codex_S02EventFlyers.description: As proof of having operated on Crescent Falls or Tharis Island

Codex_S02EventNests.description: There have been reports of some very strange looking organic structures appearing on Bright Sands and Crescent Falls. This might forebode something sinister for the future of Fortuna III...  The factions, as part of their event missions, may ask daredevil prospectors to go and investigate what's actually going on.

DialogContainer_ExitGame.description: Are you sure you want to exit the game?
